A atuação é organizada para resposta ráp: Operations are organized for rapid response during the critical crop-circle season in southern Brazil, with teams ready for immediate deployment and standardized collection.
A prioridade é registrar cedo, antes de: The priority is early documentation, before trampling and signal loss.
Agilidade de deslocamento e isolamento i: Fast deployment and immediate area isolation are critical to prevent contamination and loss of evidence.
Análise e discussão dos dados obtidos: Analysis and discussion of collected data
Ao apoiar o Projeto Esfera, patrocinador: By supporting Projeto Esfera, sponsors help build reliable knowledge and preserve data that supports future research and qualified public debate.
As imagens de campo devem ser captadas n: Field images must be captured at the earliest stage of an event, with georeferencing, sketching, and marked collection points, preserving the chain of evidence for later technical analysis.
Associe sua marca à ciência e inovação: Associate your brand with science and innovation
Buscamos parceiros que valorizem conheci: We seek partners who value knowledge, technology, and serious research.
We seek partners who value knowledge, technology, and serious research. Your brand can support logistics, equipment, and scientific outreach.

Comparação de amostras afetadas e não af: Comparison of affected and unaffected samples to detect biological changes.
Compartilhe este projeto e ajude a forta: Share this project and help strengthen applied science and evidence preservation.
Diretrizes, metodologia e protocolos con: Guidelines, methodology, and protocols condensed for executive presentation.

Eng. Douglas A. N. de Oliveira: Eng. Douglas A. N. de Oliveira
Eng. Douglas Albrecht Novo de Oliveira: Eng. Douglas Albrecht Novo de Oliveira
Engenheiro Agrônomo (UDESC, 22 anos) e E: Agronomist engineer (UDESC, 22 years) and civil engineer (UDC, 11 years). Postgraduate in Structures and Geotechnics. Began crop-circle studies in 2016, with sample collection and soil/leaf analysis. Studies published by Revista UFO. Researches design precision, events fabricated by Circle Makers, and development of technical plates and a national catalog on crop circles.
Engenheiro agrônomo e civil, focado em p: Agronomist and civil engineer focused on geometric precision in crop circles.

Fortalece a cultura científica e o diálo: Strengthens scientific culture and responsible dialogue on the topic.

Fundador do CIPEX, referência em pesquis: Founder of CIPEX, a reference in field research and ufological investigation.
Gerar evidências confiáveis para estudos: Generate reliable evidence for further studies.
Gestor de TI e ufólogo, com atuação em d: IT manager and ufologist focused on documentation and historical analysis.
Gestor em Tecnologia da Informação e ufó: Information Technology manager and ufologist since 1997, specialized in relations between governments and the UFO phenomenon. Author of the books “UFOs in Space and on the Moon” and “Official UFO Night.” Speaker and editor of the Fenomenum portal. CIPEX member since 1998 and former consultant to Revista UFO. Participated in the public hearing on Ufology in the Brazilian Senate (2022).
Graduação em Física Lic. Plena (1996). M: Bachelor’s degree in Physics (1996). Master’s degree in Electrical Engineering and Industrial Informatics (UTFPR, 2000). Experience with experimental methods, instrumentation for elementary particles, and nuclear physics. Work in distance-learning technology and microcontroller projects. Teaching in embedded systems. Professor in the Computer Science Department at UTFPR – Medianeira Campus.
Graduado em Medicina Veterinária pela UF: Graduated in Veterinary Medicine from UFPR (1986). Postgraduate in Methodology of Science at Faculdade Espírita (1993). Professional Master’s in Environmental Management from Universidade Positivo (2011). Forensic training at the Higher School of Civil Police (1990). Retired criminal expert. University professor, lecturer, co-editor, and special advisor to Revista UFO. Member of CBU, founder of IBEXO, and member of CBPDV. Specialized in crop-circle research since 2008.
Integra técnicas de física, engenharia e: Integrates physics, engineering, and biology techniques to analyze complex phenomena.
Investigação séria de agroglifos brasile: Serious investigation of Brazilian crop circles
Investigamos agroglifos com metodologia: We investigate crop circles with scientific methodology, advanced technology, and field protocols that ensure traceability. The phenomenon is complex; our response must be too.
Logo em destaque e menção nos relatórios: Featured logo and mention in reports.
Mensurar campos eletromagnéticos e magné: Measure electromagnetic and magnetic fields in three axes.
Mensurar e analisar campos eletromagnéti: Measure and analyze electromagnetic and magnetic fields.

O Projeto Esfera estrutura uma resposta: Projeto Esfera structures a scientific, multidisciplinary response to crop circles in Brazil, with rigorous protocols, advanced technology, and operational readiness.
O Projeto Esfera não busca conclusões fá: Projeto Esfera does not seek easy conclusions. Our mission is to document what is observable, measure what is measurable, and preserve data before time and noise destroy it.
O Projeto Esfera nasce da necessidade de: Projeto Esfera was created from the need to investigate Brazilian crop circles with scientific rigor. The team brings together researchers from different fields to document, measure, and analyze physical and electromagnetic signals observed in crop fields, preserving evidence and data.
O projeto mantém mente aberta, mas orien: The project keeps an open mind, but data-driven, with critical analysis and complete records.
O protocolo inclui retorno aos locais em: The protocol includes returning to sites in following cycles to verify traces and “ghost marks,” comparing geometric patterns, crop context, and data consistency across seasons.
Multidisciplinary researcher and ufologist. Trained in Electronics, worked in INFRAERO engineering and maintenance (CREA no. 260252326-7). Expert in Telecommunications and Radio Aids to Air Navigation. Specialist for the Aeronautics Command in the DME system. Has researched crop circles for years. Author of the book “Parallel Dimensions” (Revista UFO).
Palestra com apoio da prefeitura de Ipua: Talk with support from the city hall of Ipuaçu with local farmers to raise awareness of the importance of the research.
Processamento de amostras, interpretação: Sample processing, result interpretation, and technical publication.
Prof. Dr. Eng. Fernando M. Araújo-Moreir: Prof. Dr. Eng. Fernando M. Araújo-Moreira
Professor Titular do IME; coordenador de: Full Professor at IME; SE7/Nuclear Engineering Research Coordinator (DCT/Army Command) since August 25, 2021. Full Professor in the Physics Department at UFSCar until August 25, 2021. Materials engineer, Master’s (UFSCar, 1990) and PhD in Physics (UFSCar, 1995), postdoctoral researcher at the Center for Superconductivity Research. Full Associate of IGHMB. Director of IEAE/UFSCar. Analyzed samples from the Prudentópolis crop circles and identified absence of microbial life in the stem folds of the 2016 formation.
Professor universitário, pedagogo (1992): University professor, pedagogue (1992), and visual artist (2020). Specialized in Human Resources Administration (1994) and Higher Education Teaching (1996). Master’s in Education from UFPR (2000) and PhD in Education from PUCRJ (2009). Postdoctoral researcher in Language Studies at UEMS. Founder of CIPEX (1982). Created and taught ufology courses in 1996 and 1998 at Faculdades Integradas Espírita in Curitiba. Consultant and writer for Revista UFO for over 20 years. Speaker at national and international events. Producer of the documentaries “Unpredictable and Controversial Flying Discs” (parts 1–4) and “Chupacabras Dossier.” Author of “Dragon Eyes: Reflections for a New Reality” (2001) and “Strange Harvest: Human Mutilations of the Uncanny” (2018). Field researcher in ufological cases and abductions for over 40 years and in Brazilian crop circles for 16 years. Member of the Brazilian Ufologists Commission (CBU).
Projeto Esfera — investigação científica: Projeto Esfera — scientific crop-circle research in Brazil
Projeto Esfera | Ufologia Científica e A: Projeto Esfera | Scientific Ufology and Crop Circles
Projeto Esfera: investigação científica: Projeto Esfera: scientific crop-circle research in Brazil with rigorous methodology, advanced technology, and a multidisciplinary team.
Projeto idealizado pelo CIPEX — Centro d: Project conceived by CIPEX — Center for Investigation and Exobiological Research.
Radialista e ufólogo, especialista em ag: Radio host and ufologist, crop-circle specialist since 2008.
Pesquisar agroglifos é muito similar a u: Researching crop circles is very similar to a criminal police investigation. The sooner we reach the site and the fewer people enter the area, the more evidence we can preserve.
O monitoramento prioriza Ipuaçu (SC) e P: Monitoring prioritizes Ipuaçu (SC) and Prudentópolis (PR), with local activation for emergency travel, site isolation, and the start of technical collection.
A lógica do projeto nasce da recorrência: The project logic comes from the historical recurrence in these regions, especially during harvest season: because records repeatedly emerge in these hubs, we can maintain a previously planned, coordinated, and faster response.

O primeiro agroglifo brasileiro consider: The first Brazilian crop circle considered authentic appeared on November 9, 2008, in Ipuaçu (SC). The historical base below summarizes the records that guide the current operation.
Clique em cada ano para abrir o resumo c: Click each year to open the full summary with a reference image.
Primeiro registro considerado autêntico: First record considered authentic in Ipuaçu (SC).
Em 09 de novembro de 2008 foi registrado: On November 9, 2008, the first Brazilian crop circle considered authentic was recorded in Ipuaçu (SC). The next day, another relevant record occurred in Ouro Verde.
Imagem de referência histórica de agrogl: Historical reference image of the 2008 crop circle
Registro de “marca fantasma” em plantaçã: Record of a “ghost mark” in alternate crops, reinforcing verification in subsequent cycles.
Em 2012, um agroglifo em Ipuaçu apresent: In 2012, a crop circle in Ipuaçu showed a more complex formation and consolidated monitoring of the so-called “ghost mark” in later seasons.
Imagem de referência histórica de agrogl: Historical reference image of the 2012 crop circle
Prudentópolis (PR) apresentou um dos cas: Prudentópolis (PR) presented one of the cases with the most detailed laboratory analysis.
O caso de Prudentópolis (PR), em 2016, r: The Prudentópolis (PR) case in 2016 combined electromagnetic field measurements and laboratory analysis with findings relevant to scientific investigation.

Retorno das ocorrências em Ipuaçu, retom: Return of occurrences in Ipuaçu, resuming intensive monitoring.
Após um período sem registros fortes, 20: After a period without strong records, 2022 marked the return of occurrences in Ipuaçu and the reactivation of intensive field monitoring.
Imagem de referência histórica de agrogl: Historical reference image of the 2022 crop circle in Ipuaçu

Novo registro e destruição prematura da: New record and premature destruction of the formation, reinforcing the importance of rapid isolation.
Em 2025 houve novo registro em Ipuaçu, p: In 2025 there was a new record in Ipuaçu, but with premature destruction of the formation on the same day, reinforcing the need for rapid isolation to preserve evidence.
Referência gráfica para caso de 2025 e n: Graphic reference for the 2025 case and the need for rapid isolation

Registrar a geometria dos agroglifos com: Record crop-circle geometry with high precision.
Repórter e ufólogo, pesquisa ufologia de: Reporter and ufologist, researching ufology since childhood. Crop-circle specialist since 2008, with studies on the phenomenon in England. Followed the Antônio Nelson Tasca case and wrote the preface to the 2nd edition of the book “A Man Marked by ETs.” Contributor to Revista UFO. CIPEX representative in western Santa Catarina.

Tecnólogo em Eletroeletrônica Industrial: Industrial Electroelectronics technologist (FATEC-PR, 2007) with additional training in industrial electronics, microcontrollers, microprocessors, and English. Course instructor at UFPR and FATEC-PR. Holds several patents (PI0703210-2, PI090192-0, PI0900604-4, PI0604164-7 and PI0604164). Owner of Holostech Soluções em Eletrônica, responsible for over 100 prototypes for academic and industrial research. CIPEX member and technical consultant.
Tecnólogo em eletroeletrônica industrial: Industrial electroelectronics technologist and CIPEX technical consultant.

O Projeto Esfera estrutura uma resposta: Projeto Esfera structures a scientific, multidisciplinary response to crop circles in Brazil, with rigorous protocols, advanced technology, and operational readiness, preserving evidence before it disappears.

Ao apoiar o Projeto Esfera, patrocinador: By supporting Projeto Esfera, sponsors help build reliable knowledge and preserve data that supports future research and qualified public debate. You actively participate in the scientific preservation of the phenomenon.
Ipuaçu localizado na região Oeste de San: Ipuaçu is located in the western region of Santa Catarina, where crop circles have repeatedly appeared since 2008.
Agroglifo de 2016 em Prudentópolis (PR): 2016 crop circle in Prudentópolis (PR) – Toni Inajar archive.
Agroglifo de 2022 em Ipuaçu (SC) – Image: 2022 crop circle in Ipuaçu (SC) – Image by Tiago Kosiski.
Croqui elaborado pelo Eng. Douglas Albre: Sketch prepared by Eng. Douglas Albrecht Novo de Oliveira based on measurements by Carlos Alberto Machado.
Trator destruindo o agroglifo de 2025 em: Tractor destroying the 2025 crop circle in Ipuaçu on the same day it appeared.
Nos anos posteriores, os casos passaram: In the following years, cases began to be closely monitored by field researchers, consolidating Ipuaçu as a reference in Brazil's historical series.
O registro de 13 de outubro de 2012 dest: The October 13, 2012 record stood out for its geometry (28 smaller circles and one larger connected circle) and for being observed in the morning, unlike the predominant nighttime pattern.
As leituras desse ciclo incluíram variaç: Readings from this cycle included electromagnetic variations and microbiological results that reinforced the need for fast technical protocols and rigorous on-site collection.
Esse retorno reorganizou a prontidão ope: This return reorganized the team's operational readiness for the critical harvest months and reaffirmed the planned response logic for the region.
Em 14 de outubro de 2024, diferentes equ: On October 14, 2024, different teams went to the field; there was divergence in assessment between groups, reinforcing the importance of methodological standardization and cross-report comparison.
No registro de 03 de novembro de 2025, a: In the November 3, 2025 record, early destruction hindered full collection and highlighted once again the need for local awareness and immediate isolation action.
